frontmatter.title: Hi, my name is
frontmatter.name: Huzaifa Ahmed
frontmatter.subtitle: I build things for the internet.

node.html: I'm a software engineer based in Karachi, specializing in building (and occasionally designing) exceptional, high-quality websites and applications.

Hello! I'm Huzaifa Ahmed, a software engineer based in Karachi, who enjoys building things that live on the internet. I develop exceptional websites and web apps that provide intuitive, pixel-perfect user interfaces with efficient and modern backends.

During my graduation from Sir Syed UET, I joined the engineering team at AppBakerZ where I work on a wide variety of interesting and meaningful projects on a daily basis.

Here's a few technologies I've been working with recently:

• Write modern, performant, maintainable code for a diverse array of client and internal projects
  • Work with a variety of different languages, platforms, frameworks, and content management systems such as JavaScript, React, GraphQL, React Native, Flutter etc
  • Communicate with multi-disciplinary teams of engineers, designers, producers, and clients on a daily basis

• Worked with a team of three designers to build a digital agency website for AppBakerZ.
  • Helped solidify a brand direction for blistabloc that spans both packaging and web
  • Interfaced with clients on a weekly basis, providing technological expertise

A Mobile App made on React Native for a shipping line company based in singapore, it manages all day to day operations of company, like tracking a shipment or truck, monitor all actions during a shipment and can chat within the app.
A website for digital agency i.e. AppBakerZ, you can view their Projects and work, like Web Application Development, Mobile Apps Development, Logo Designing and Content Writing.
Meals App made on FLutter in which you can view various foods and their recipe and can also mark them as favorite.
Personal Expense App in which you can record your day to day expenses and keep track of them, and there is also a chart which shows your recent transaction in graphical representation.
Whatsapp UI clone made on React Native with multiple Screens, used Stack and Tab Navigations and React Native Camera to take snaps.
Although I'm currently looking for freelance opportunities, my inbox is always open. Whether for a potential project or just to say hi, I'll try my best to answer your email!
